summary: This is a small dungeon I made for another project. There is no prize for completing it.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2676350-1369023874.jpg[/img]

[size=5] [color=Yellow] Main Features[/color] [/size]

This is a small dungeon I made for another project that didn't get used. There is no "prize" for completing it.

[size=5] [color=Yellow] Update (v1.1)[/color] [/size]

-->More Clutter
-->Better Lighting
-->Added Connection to Tamriel
-->Fixed some sharp edges

[size=5][color=Yellow]Installation[/color][/size]

[color=red]Skyrim must be updated to the latest patch[/color]

Via NMM or Mod Organizer: Everything follows the basic procedure for all files.
Manually: Again, follow standard procedure for all files: drop the main file and the loose folders.

[color=Yellow] [size=5]Recommended Mods[/size] [/color]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14227] Ruins Clutter Improved [/url]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29145] Hectoral Caves Deluxe [/url]


By [color=Yellow]BWchief117 (or bw117)[/color]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/users/2676350?tab=user+files] [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2676350-1386747147.jpg[/img] [/url]
author: BW117

files.name: Fungal Cave_1-1
files.changelogHtml:

Better Lighting
